General.Name: Guizhou Broadcasting&TV Info
General.Description: Guizhou BC&TV Information Network CO.,LTD operates broadcasting and television networks in China. It offers interactive TV, standard definition and high definition TV, personal broadband, mobile machine, and contract maintenance services, as well as multi-screen viewing and customized solutions. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Guiyang, China.

3.Name: Mr. Wen Huang  Zhong
3.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
